pasteCommand.noWorkspace: No workspace is open. Please include the file in a workspace.
pasteCommand.imageSaveError: WebP image save failed. File does not exist: {0}
config.imageDir.description: Folder name for saving images. Relative path.
config.quality.description: Image quality (0-100). Higher values mean better quality but larger file size.
config.namingConvention.description: File naming pattern. Supports ${timestamp} and ${seq} placeholders.
config.useWorkspaceRoot.description: Use workspace root as base path instead of current file's directory.
config.debugMode.description: Enable debug logging to console (default: false).
config.invalidNamingConvention: File naming convention is not set
